contents:
https://gain.fas.usda.gov/Recent%20GAIN%20Publications/Voracious%20Fall%20Armyworm%20Invades%20South%20China_Beijing_China%20-%20Peoples%20Republic%20of_4-30-2019.pdf
https://gain.fas.usda.gov/Recent%20GAIN%20Publications/Fall%20Armyworm%20Spreads%20into%2015%20of%20Chinas%20Provinces_Beijing_China%20-%20Peoples%20Republic%20of_5-30-2019.pdf
4月末时，Fall Armyworm 只在3个省内有确定的分布；到5月末时，则已有15个省。以这个速度，很有可能，Fall Armyworm 已经传遍中国。更要命的是，在中国，没有 Fall Armyworm 的天然捕食者。
